mapper.insert: insert into REQUEST_TBL(REQUEST_NUM, REQUEST_CATEGORY, REQUEST_USE, REQUEST_MONEY, MEMBER_NUM, REQUEST_WRITER, REQUEST_CONTENT, REQUEST_TITLE, REQUEST_FINISH, REQUEST_DEAD) values(REQUEST_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{requestCategory}, #{requestUse}, #{requestMoney}, #{memberNum}, #{requestWriter}, #{requestContent}, #{requestTitle}, #{requestFinish}, #{requestDead})
mapper.select:
select REQUEST_NUM, REQUEST_STATUS, REQUEST_CATEGORY, REQUEST_USE, REQUEST_TITLE, REQUEST_WRITER, REQUEST_DELETE, REQUEST_FINISH, REQUEST_DEAD from (select rownum rn, REQUEST_NUM, REQUEST_STATUS, REQUEST_CATEGORY, REQUEST_USE, REQUEST_TITLE, REQUEST_WRITER, REQUEST_DELETE, REQUEST_FINISH, REQUEST_DEAD FROM REQUEST_TBL WHERE
rownum <=#{rqpageNum} * #{rqamount} AND REQUEST_DELETE = 'N') where rn>(#{rqpageNum}-1) * #{rqamount} ORDER BY REQUEST_NUM DESC

select REQUEST_NUM, REQUEST_CATEGORY, REQUEST_USE, REQUEST_MONEY, MEMBER_NUM, REQUEST_CONTENT, REQUEST_STATUS, REQUEST_TITLE, REQUEST_WRITER, REQUEST_FINISH, REQUEST_DEAD, REQUEST_DELETE from REQUEST_TBL where REQUEST_NUM = #{requestNum} AND REQUEST_DELETE='N'
select count(*) from REQUEST_TBL where REQUEST_NUM>0 AND REQUEST_DELETE ='N'
